options.name: icon
options.description: Start a vote to change the server's icon.

options.name: image_url
options.description: What is the URL of the image you want to use as the server's icon?

options.name: name
options.description: Start a vote to change the server's name.

options.name: name
options.description: What do you want to change the server's name to?

options.name: invite
options.description: Start a vote to invite a new user to the server.

options.name: user
options.description: Who do you want to invite to the server? Briefly describe them here.

options.name: reason
options.description: Why do you want to invite this user to the server?

options.name: other
options.description: Start a vote about anything else.

options.name: reason
options.description: What do you want to start a vote about?

options.name: end
options.description: End a vote early. This cancels the vote, meaning that it will not pass.

options.name: id
options.description: What is the vote ID? This will be listed in the vote message.

options.name: status
options.description: Get the status of a vote

options.name: id
options.description: What is the vote ID? This will be listed in the vote message.
